Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Island

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.modelObservables.MotherNatureMovementObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Island
Direct Known Subclasses:
IslandGroup, SingleIsland
public abstract class Island extends MotherNatureMovementObservable
Island abstract class represent a generic island of the island map of the game. The island contains students and can also contain towers, mother nature and no entry tiles. An Island can be a SingleIsland or an IslandGroup, for which the composite pattern was used.
See Also:
  • MotherNatureMovementObservable
  • SingleIsland
  • IslandGroup

    • isMotherNaturePresent

      public boolean isMotherNaturePresent()
      Returns true if mother nature is present on the island, otherwise false
      Returns:
      true if mother nature is present on the island, otherwise false

    • setMotherNaturePresent

      public void setMotherNaturePresent(boolean motherNaturePresent)
      Method setMotherNaturePresent set mother nature presence on the island; if mother nature is inserted on the island and there aren't no entry tiles present on the island, this method calls the notifyObservers method of the super class; if mother nature is inserted on the island and there are no entry tiles this method removes one of them.
      Parameters:
      motherNaturePresent - boolean value that specifies if mother nature is about to be inserted on the island or not

    • getNoEntryTilePresents

      public int getNoEntryTilePresents()
      Returns the number of no entry tiles present on the island
      Returns:
      the number of no entry tiles

    • insertNoEntryTile

      public void insertNoEntryTile(NoEntryTileManager noEntryTileManager)
      Inserts a no entry tile in the island
      Parameters:
      noEntryTileManager - the NoEntryTileManager from whom the no entry tile is taken

    • removeNoEntryTile

      private void removeNoEntryTile()
      Removes a no entry tile from the island and adds it to the no entry tiles manager that have previously added the no entry tile to the island

    • getTowerType

      public TowerType getTowerType()
      Returns the tower that is present on the island. If no tower is present, the method returns null
      Returns:
      the tower that is present on the island

      Assign a tower to the island
      Parameters:
      towerType - the assigned tower

      public void restoreIsland(Game game)
